attributes.action: Don’t close moray school’s libraries and get rid of our librarians.
attributes.background: The Moray Council is threatening to close our secondary schools’ libraries and get rid of our librarians. And we think this shouldn’t be allowed. As it is so important for our learning and we would like to stop this .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You can find out how to petition Moray Council here:

http://www.moray.gov.uk/moray_standard/page_85465.html
